TEXT.English: Your firing position (flat land) to a plot of the same level makes you lose efficiency
TEXT.French: Votre position de tir (Terrain plat) vers un terrain plat de même niveau vous fait perdre de l'efficacité
TEXT.German: Your firing position (flat land) to a plot of the same level makes you lose efficiency
TEXT.Italian: Your firing position (flat land) to a plot of the same level makes you lose efficiency
TEXT.Spanish: Your firing position (flat land) to a plot of the same level makes you lose efficiency

TEXT.English: Your target on light forest makes you lose efficiency
TEXT.French: Votre cible sur forêt clairsemée vous fait perdre de l'efficacité
TEXT.German: Your target on light forest makes you lose efficiency
TEXT.Italian: Your target on light forest makes you lose efficiency
TEXT.Spanish: Your target on light forest makes you lose efficiency

TEXT.English: Your target on hillst makes you lose efficiency

TEXT.German: Your target on hillst/light forest makes you lose efficiency
TEXT.Italian: Your target on hillst/light forest makes you lose efficiency
TEXT.Spanish: Your target on hillst/light forest makes you lose efficiency

TEXT.Spanish: Your firing position (Hill) to a hill makes you lose efficiency
